Question: Michael Jackson was a big fan of this person, and this person claimed Jackson "had always been very supportive" of his work.
Hints: Several videos have included appearances by notable celebrities in addition to this person and his band.
On October 7, 2008, this person released to the iTunes Store "Whatever You Like", a parody of the T.I.
In addition to recording his albums, this person wrote and starred in the film UHF and The Weird Al Show.
